backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing recipes, adding new ones, and returning filtered recommendations based on allergies with basic helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required UI asset behavior, audio playback fixes, and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables with global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon with meta description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing form state, results toggle, hero section with decorative images, and page layout including audio controls.
Image wrapper that hides itself on load error to avoid broken decorative assets.
frontend/src/components/DishImage.tsx: Dish image component resolving static asset paths with error fallback UI and reset on reference change.
Comprehensive health input form handling conditions, allergies, validation, and submit flow invoking recommendations.
frontend/src/components/ResultsView.tsx: Displays user health input summary and recommended dishes with badges, images, and navigation back to editing inputs.
frontend/src/components/SoundtrackContro: Provides audio playback, volume, and mute controls using saved soundtrack preferences with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication context for Internet Identity, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that calls the backend to fetch food recommendations based on health parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundtrackPreferen: Manages persistent soundtrack settings such as enabled state, volume, and mute using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, radius, and UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nutrition values into readable strings with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates user health form inputs including age, weight, blood pressure, and logical constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including app goals, architectural notes, known issues, image requirements, and existing features for a health‑focused food‑recommendation app.
